message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI 

This paper proposes a framework for predicting conversions in advertisements using multi-task learning, conditional attention, and attention highlighting. These techniques are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) tasks, which are covered by the arXiv sub-categories cs.CL and cs.CV, respectively. The paper also involves machine learning (ML) techniques such as deep learning and neural networks, which are covered by the sub-categories cs.LG and cs.AI. Finally, the paper deals with the problem of data imbalance, which is a common issue in information retrieval (IR) tasks, covered by the sub-category cs.IR. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories for this paper are cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, and cs.AI, in that order.
